answers.answer: I had mah first daughter 2wks early due to preeclampsia...
Had mine 5 weeks early due to placenta abruptoion. Started bleeding an went into labor
My daughter came only 4 days early, this baby is due April 11th but doc thinks he will come a early cause he is measuring ahead.

question: I'm due April 14 , now I've been told that that's just a day to prepare yourself for but I've been noticing that girls have their babies way before the day like 8 weeks before and stuff.  Well tell me about y'all? Did y'all have ur babies before the due date? If so, how early..?
title: baby born before due dates???
